description: This file defines an enumeration of platform roles for RBAC, along with utility functions to parse roles from strings and list all roles.

classes.name: Role
classes.description: An enumeration representing platform roles used for RBAC, with string values.

methods.name: from_str
methods.description: Parses a role from a string input, supporting case-insensitive and separator variations.

methods.name: list_all
methods.description: Returns a list of all defined roles.
